name: Python
creator: Guido van Rossum
description: Python is a high-level, interpreted, and general-purpose programming language. It is known for its clear syntax and readability, making it ideal for beginners and professionals alike. Python is used in a variety of applications, from web development to data analysis and artificial intelligence.

name: JavaScript
creator: Brendan Eich
description: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted, and dynamically typed programming language. It is widely used for web development, enabling interactivity on web pages. Additionally, it is commonly used in server-side applications (Node.js) and game development.

name: C++
creator: Bjarne Stroustrup
description: C++ is a general-purpose programming language based on C. It adds object-oriented features and generic programming support, making it a powerful and flexible language. C++ is widely used for developing system software, game engines, and performance-critical applications.

name: C#
creator: Microsoft
description: C# (pronounced C sharp) is a modern, object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft. It is designed for building a variety of applications on the .NET platform. C# is commonly used for developing Windows desktop applications, web applications, and games.

name: TypeScript
creator: Microsoft
description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and other features to the language. It aims to make large-scale JavaScript application development more robust and maintainable. TypeScript is often used in combination with modern web frameworks like Angular and React.
